subtask.title: Gather Examples and Case Studies
subtask.objective: Collect real-world examples demonstrating AI integration in sysadmin workflows, focusing on monitoring and alerting.
subtask.scope: Research case studies, tutorials, and success stories from credible sources.

verification.completion_summary: The research findings provide relevant examples and discussions on AI agents, orchestration, and automation related to sysadmin workflows, especially concerning monitoring and alerting. However, the information is primarily conceptual and based on AI platform workflows, with limited direct real-world case studies or success stories explicitly demonstrating AI integration into actual sysadmin environments.

covered_aspects: examples of AI in automation tasks
missing_aspects: detailed case studies from credible sources
concrete success stories of AI applied specifically in sysadmin monitoring and alerting

missing_requirements: specific real-world case studies demonstrating AI in sysadmin workflows
credible success stories from industry sources
